inclusion.criterion: Clinical diagnosis of Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder as primary or co-primary diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Score on CY-BOCS of 16 or greater
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Full Scale IQ greater than or equal to 85
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Receiving concurrent psychotherapy or a past adequate trial of CBT for OCD
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Initiation of an antidepressant within 12 weeks before study enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Initiation of an antipsychotic within 6 weeks before study enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: No new alternative medications, nutritionals, or therapeutic diets within 6 weeks of study enrollment
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any change in established psychotropic medication within 8 weeks before study enrollment (6 weeks for antipsychotic). Alternative medications must be stable for 6 weeks prior to baseline. Any medications must remain stable during treatment.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Substance abuse within the past six months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Hoarding symptoms (due to difficulty implementing E/RP tasks)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has general and non-specific bones and joints pain, but no other significant medical history. BMI is within normal range.
